docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Couples who become adoptive and foster parents of drug-exposed babies often find that rearing them is vastly more difficult than experts had predicted.

headline.main: Adopting Drug Babies    A Special Report;   Child-Rearing Is Stormy When Drugs Cloud Birth

docs.snippet: LEAD: Couples who become adoptive and foster parents of drug-exposed babies often find that rearing them is vastly more difficult than experts had predicted.

byline.original: By SANDRA BLAKESLEE, Special to The New York Times
